data.Name: VRSTY
data.Bio: VRSTY (pronounced Varsity) is a 4 piece R&B /post-hardcore infused band from NYC. Since inception VRSTY has always been about standing out & setting themselves apart from the “norms & cliches” of the Post-Hardcore scene while also bringing something fresh and inspirational to the listener. Blending heavy and melodic instruments with R&B singing VRSTY has already made waves playing sold out shows with acts such as The Plot In You, Dayseeker, Like Moths To Flames, Ice Nine Kills & Slaves while also touring the country numerous times. Read more on Last.fm
